Name: Virtual Army: Revolution
About the game: Team based arcade multiplayer FPS for Virtual Reality. Virtual Army: Revolution immerses players into the most gritty and chaotic modern combat experience. Casual gameplay with ranking and progression. Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR Available for Arcades on SynthesisVR Available for Arcades on PrivateLabelVR General Casual / arcade gameplay Play standing or seated. Crossplay with PC players (Mouse & Keyboard) Arcade mode for commercial venues Features 5 v 5 online multiplayer 10 maps (small - medium size) 4 game modes: Free-For-All, Team Deathmatch, Domination, Gun Game Reloading - Automatic & Manual Progression: Ranking, unlocks, weapon skins and attachments Bots
